mapper.select:
SELECT s.`staffid`,d.`departmentname`,p.`positionname`, s.`staffname`,s.`staffsex`,s.`saddress`,s.`sstarttime`,s.sendtime,s.`staffaccount`,s.`price` FROM `department` AS d,`position` AS p,`staff` AS s
d.`departmentid`=p.`departmentid` AND s.`positionid`=p.`positionid`
and `staffname` like '%${staffname}%'
and s.state=1
mapper.update: update staff set sendtime=null,state=0 where staffname=#{staffname}
